summary: "TAKATA RECALL" PASSENGER DOOR CAME OPEN WHILE DRIVING HOME FROM WORK ON 6/29/17. DOOR LATCH WILL NOT LATCH ONTO THE FRAME OF THE VEHICLE WHILE ATTEMPTING TO SHUT DOOR. CURRENT STATUS OF THE SITUATION IS AN APPT WITH MY LOCAL FORD DEALERSHIP ON 7/10/17. NO RECALL ON MY VIN BUT THERE IS A CURRENT RECALL ON 2013-2014 FUSION MODELS ASSEMBLIED IN MEXICO.
